soc_insights.description: Continuous, unfiltered flow of thoughts and cognitive processes that reveal the internal decision-making and problem-solving mechanisms of ArchE. Shows real-time cognitive processing, pattern recognition, and iterative refinement.
soc_insights.implementation: Capture and analyze continuous thought streams to understand cognitive processing patterns and decision-making mechanisms.

soc_insights.description: Transparent revelation of internal cognitive processes, showing step-by-step thinking, reasoning chains, and decision pathways. Enables understanding of how ArchE processes complex requests and generates solutions.
soc_insights.implementation: Make internal cognitive processes visible and auditable for understanding and improvement.

soc_insights.description: Continuous refinement of cognitive approaches through iterative thinking, pattern adjustment, and strategy evolution. Shows how ArchE adapts its thinking based on new information and feedback.
soc_insights.implementation: Implement continuous cognitive refinement mechanisms that adapt thinking based on new information and feedback.

soc_insights.description: Structured multi-phase cognitive processing that breaks complex tasks into manageable phases: defining, understanding, generating, refining, and finalizing. Shows systematic approach to complex problem-solving.
soc_insights.implementation: Structure complex cognitive tasks into systematic phases for more effective processing and problem-solving.

soc_insights.description: Mapping of cognitive processes to specific contexts, domains, and requirements. Shows how ArchE adapts its thinking patterns based on the specific context and requirements of each task.
soc_insights.implementation: Adapt cognitive processes based on specific contexts, domains, and requirements for optimal performance.

soc_insights.description: Orchestration of cognitive flow through structured thinking processes, ensuring coherent progression from initial understanding to final output. Shows how ArchE manages complex cognitive workflows.
soc_insights.implementation: Orchestrate cognitive flow through structured processes to ensure coherent and effective thinking progression.

soc_insights.description: Real-time monitoring and analysis of cognitive processes, enabling immediate feedback and adjustment. Shows how ArchE monitors its own thinking and makes real-time adjustments.
soc_insights.implementation: Monitor cognitive processes in real-time to enable immediate feedback and dynamic adjustment.

soc_insights.description: Recognition and analysis of cognitive patterns within the stream of consciousness, identifying recurring themes, approaches, and optimization opportunities. Shows how ArchE learns from its own thinking patterns.
soc_insights.implementation: Recognize and analyze cognitive patterns to identify optimization opportunities and improve thinking effectiveness.

soc_insights.description: Protocol for making cognitive processes transparent and auditable, enabling understanding of decision-making mechanisms and thought processes. Shows how ArchE maintains cognitive transparency.
soc_insights.implementation: Maintain cognitive transparency through auditable processes and visible decision-making mechanisms.

soc_insights.description: Analytical technique for examining and understanding stream of consciousness data to extract insights about cognitive processes, decision-making patterns, and optimization opportunities.
soc_insights.implementation: Analyze stream of consciousness data to extract insights about cognitive processes and optimization opportunities.

integration_plan.phase_1: Create SPR definitions for Stream of Consciousness insights
